title: Florida exports more oranges than Georgia

content.prompt: The state of Florida earns greater revenues from the export of oranges than does the  state of Georgia. This can be attributed to  which of the following?

choices.label: Florida has a comparative advantage as a producer of oranges.
Georgia has a comparative advantage as a producer of oranges.
Florida’s economy is primarily based on agricultural production.
Georgia’s economy is focused on tourism and manufacturing.
Unlike Florida, Georgia has no coastal port facilities.

unit.text: 7: Industrial and Economic Development Patterns and Processes

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe a relevant geographic concept, process, model, or theory in a specified context.
